content: giulietta is a main character in the opera les contes d hoffmann the tales of hoffmann by jacques offenbach bribed with a magnificent diamond giulietta makes hoffmann fall in love with her and then steals his reflection from a mirror in the pattern of these feminine socks you can see the faceted jewels and the round shape of mirrors feel sparkling and seductive while wearing them or just enjoy the pretty lacy pair of socks - it s up to you
